title: Alpha Sydney Diamond+ LFM
body:
Alpha Sydney is an organisation dedicated to achieving the best results in a variety of different games. As the success of our CS:GO team, we have chosen to expand into League of Legends. This means that we are looking for players to fill our challenger team that will be serious and maintain a steadily growing team to climb the ranks. 

What Alpha Sydney can do for you?
We are currently in the process of gaining sponsorships throughout out many different companies and will assist you in anything League of Legends or other. We will also tend to:
- Team Speak server
- Entry Fees for any comp
- Editing/Graphics
- Gear (Mouse pad, jersey etc.)

We are looking for players of at least Diamond rank and some team experience. Our end goal is to come into the OPL. Must be dedicated to the team and its success. There will be trials for every single player joining which will be posted on a later date.
If you are interested, please reply directly to this thread or add ASYD Doss on League of Legends. Only serious requests please. Thank you for reading and the best of luck to all of you.

replies.body:
Rank Plat 3.
Main Top
Age 22
Previous Diamond elo player in TW server
I like to study league tactics and has deep understanding of current meta
Diamond 1 adc main, add me for a trial

Rank Diamond 5.
Main jungle but adverse in positions. 
Little experience in teams but work well, also shotcalling in teams.
I understand this is a long shot, gold 5 mid/top main, but the work ethic of a beast, and just need a shot somewhere

Rank: Platinum 4
Pref role: Mid/Adc/Jg in that order
Age: 20

I would absolutely love to trial for your team, I am a prior diamond 2 Mid/Adc and elo decayed to plat 5 due to loss of interest in the game, but im back and i want to join a smart, reliable, headstraight team who i can play competivly and pursuit a career in the pro leagues! :-)
Add me in game: Unmasked
